PageInfo.Message:
During an adventure, if your Health runs out, you
will collapse on the spot and enter a <COL
ffdc78>《dead state》</COL>.
If there are other players in your party, you
will be considered <COL ffdc78>incapacitated</COL>
and can be revived on the spot within a certain
amount of time with their help.
Likewise, when your fellow allies run out of
Health, you can approach them and press the <KC
TOUCH> button to assist the Arisen or Pawn.

However, when there are no other players present
or when a certain amount of time has passed, you
will have to choose one of the three revival
methods and revive.
Using "Revival Force"... Full health revival on
the spot.
Using a "Golden Gemstone"... Full health revival,
in a "Strengthened" state.
Returning to the base... Becoming a "Weakened"
state and reviving at the previous base.

If the 《Revival Force》 and 《Golden Gemstone》 are
depleted,
you will not be able to revive on the spot.
You can revive by choosing "Return to Base", but
due to the <COL ffdc78>debuff of Weakened</COL>,
your basic abilities will be lower than usual for
a certain period of time.
Always keep an eye on the remaining amount of
《Revival Force》 and 《Golden Gemstone》.
